description: This file is a C header file defining internal interfaces and macros for the OVSDB module used within the OpenSync project. It includes function declarations for JSON-RPC ID generation, transaction commenting, and transaction operation creation related to OVSDB database interactions. The file also sets up include guards and includes external dependencies such as 'ovsdb.h' and 'jansson.h'.

methods.name: onewifi_ovsdb_jsonrpc_id_new
methods.description: Returns a new JSON-RPC ID used for OVSDB JSON-RPC communication.

methods.name: onewifi_ovsdb_tran_comment
methods.description: Inserts a comment into an OVSDB transaction represented by JSON array.

methods.name: onewifi_ovsdb_tran_operation
methods.description: Generates a JSON object representing a transaction operation for OVSDB.
